DhcpInfoProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

The class provides the information for the current DHCP information.

It provides the IP address, gateway, dns1, dns2, DHCP server, Lease time.

 //assume we have a pointer "dhcpInfo" of DhcpInfo instance

 //get current DHCP status
 String dhcpinfo = dhcpInfo.toString().string();
See also:
WifiManager::getDhcpInfo()

Definition at line 33 of file DhcpInfo.h.
